title: Why My Church Grew During the Pandemic
sub_head: Our priests had no intention of limiting access to the Lord.
body:
Alexandria, Va.
We can’t find seats. The pews are full. This has been my family’s experience at St. Rita Catholic Church most Sundays since the pandemic began. Some weeks, there’s barely enough standing room in the vestibule. When other churches were shutting their doors, ours remained open. Sure enough, the faithful flocked.
